1052832818563141632.text: Since getting the X-ray I have been unable to get my foot comfortable, and the other is starting to hurt. Next step is podiatrist appointment.

1052832383391551488.text: Finally had xrays done this week. Stress fracture. I have been running around for at least three months on a fracture.

1052830963393126400.text: So I’ve been dealing with foot pain for a few months. Nothing presaged it, just sudden pain on the top of one of my feet. When it wouldn’t subside I sought out a chiropractor. Things seemed sometimes better, but intermittently.
